body_html: @lorenlugosch Did you managed to finish your binary convolution? I'm interested in knowing how to implement low-precision operations for the forward pass in CNNs... @bhack Do you know if there is any support for this in TF? Besides the 8bit quantisation process, I want a "hard" quantisation, not the one that uses the max and min with float values

I'm interested in knowing how to implement low-precision operations for the forward pass in CNNs... @bhack Do you know if there is any support for this in TF?
